quotes: Andrea Bocelli's first pop album Andrea (2004).
Iglesias also played the part of an evil Roman emperor in a Pepsi ad in 2004,
Spice Girl Melanie C for her album Beautiful Intentions (2005).
Four songs co-written by Iglesias appear on the UK band The Hollies' 2006 album Staying Power.
In 2010, Idol Allstars (Swedish Idol Series) released the song 'All I Need Is You', co-written by Iglesias with Andreas Carlsson, Kalle Engström, and Kristian Lundin.
He also co-wrote Jennifer Lopez's song 'Dance Again', which was released in 2012,
In 2000, Iglesias co-produced an off-Broadway musical called Four Guys Named Jose and Una Mujer Named Maria.
In 2007, he had a guest appearance in the TV comedy Two and a Half Men as a carpenter/handyman.
Since 2001, Iglesias has been in a relationship with Russian tennis player Anna Kournikova.
